entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:11 p.m. EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -0.3Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
